brands.name: Chanel
brands.iconic_hover: I dont do fashion, i AM fashion. - Coco Chanel
brands.iconic_sayings: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself. - Coco Chanel

brands.name: Louis Vuitton
brands.iconic_sayings: Louis Vuitton was not known for a slogan. By combining the phrase 'the Truth' with “L.V”, “Live the Truth” or “Love the Truth” refers to someone being true and confident in expressing personal fashion style, brand or lifestyle choices.

brands.name: Levi Strauss & Co
brands.founder: Levi Strauss, 1853 - San Francisco, California, U.S
brands.iconic_hover: Have you ever had a bad time in Levi’s?
brands.iconic_sayings: Our models can beat up their models.

brands.name: Versace
brands.founder: Gianni Versace, Donatella Versace, 1989 - Milan Italy
brands.iconic_hover: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are. - Gianna Versace
brands.iconic_sayings: Why do women need men nowadays? Certainly not to prove strength, determination and independence anymore. Men are needed only for love affairs and for physical relaxation. - Donatella Versace
